numContribs.explanation: Total number of contributions making up a scattering pattern

numReps.explanation: Number of independent McSAS results to compute, from which averages and uncertainties are estimated

maxIterations.explanation: Maximum number of iterations allowed before failing.

histogramBins.explanation: Amount of histogram bins used for distribution visualisation

convergenceCriterion.explanation: Reduced Chi-squared value to reach for optimisation success.

findBackground.explanation: Adds a constant background level to the model fitting.
